name: Ragtime Heist
description:
Description:

Ragtime Heist is a turn-based stealth game based in the early 20th century. Sneak your way into enemy gang's warehouses, steal their golden booze and get out without them catching you.

Ragtime Heist was a 4 month long project, developed by 7 game developers in our final year at Academy of Interactive Entertainment (AIE).  Any and all feedback would be appreciated as we are eager to improve our skills so we can provide an enjoyable experience for all of our players.

Try not to get caught!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Click to move your character & pick up items.

Mouse Pointer: Visualize where your active character can move.

WASD or Arrow Keys: Moves the camera.

Q and E: Rotates the camera.

Character Portraits: Swap between both your characters.
